localize.full_text: 我不敢相信HQ Trivia曾经拥有1750亿美元的市值。

previous.title: This is why WSB is the most important forum on this site. The game is stacked against us and individually we are nothing. Do you think any of us wouldn't be charged with something if we did the same thing? Together we can make a difference.
